comment.author: 18848263@N06
comment._content: Are these photos from the Chicago Prarie Club?  That dip in the valley may be the Cal Sag feeder basin, and this may be Kean Avenue. I'd need a better shot to see if there is a bridge down at the bottom of the hill.

comment.author: 76625210@N08
comment._content: Compare the  tips of the trees at the end of the road, They dont seem to match. That could be Country Lane. Keen does not have any hills when it crosses the Cal Sag. That pic is a much narrower valley

comment.author: 18848263@N06
comment._content: Since my original post, I think I showed this to my friend in the Palos Historical society.  This image is looking east from what I would guess to be about what would become LaGrange Road.  Perhaps this is 119th or 123rd.
